Name: Barrier
Description: Impedes movement between Zones. Action required to bypass with a GM-determined Test (e.g., Tech (Security), Athletics (Climbing)). Success allows passage, failure ends turn.

Name: Cover
Description: Protection against ranged attacks. Light (+2 Armour), Medium (+4 Armour), Heavy (+6 Armour). Move to gain benefit if starting turn in Zone; Take Cover Action if entering Zone.

Name: Dark
Description: Hiding Advantage, Awareness/Ranged Tests succeed on 01-05, Disadvantage on Dexterity, Melee, Reflexes, Tech Tests. Poorly Lit if some illumination.

Name: Difficult Terrain
Description: Speed reduced by one step (min. Slow), Disadvantage on Athletics (Running) and Reflexes (Dodge) Tests. Entering uses remaining movement.

Name: Feature
Description: Interactive objects/details triggering or removing other Traits (e.g., doors, cogitators, containers). No direct effect.

Name: Hazard
Description: Dangerous effects. Minor (5 Damage), Major (10 Damage), Deadly (15 Damage) when entering or starting turn in Zone.

Name: Obscured
Description: Lightly: Hiding Advantage, Disadvantage on Awareness/Ranged Tests. Heavily: Blinded, outside creatures cannot see or target within Zone.

Name: Poorly Lit
Description: Hiding possible, Disadvantage on Awareness (Sight) and Ranged Tests.

Name: Warp-touched
Description: Advantage on Psychic Power Tests, additional Warp Charge equal to SL, Minor Exposure (Routine (+20) Fortitude Test for Corruption), GM can trigger Psychic Phenomena.
